Description:
The Callaway Tour Sport Cap provides an athletic sport appearance with its adjustable Velcro design. It's made of moisture-wicking performance mesh fabric with cotton trim, yet has a structured design with contrast piping detailed on visor and crown and allover brand logos for a tour authentic look.


Tour authentic
Contrast piping on visor and crown
Performance mesh fabric with cotton trim
Moisture wicking
Structured design
Adjustable Velcro back closure
90% polyester/10% cotton fabric
Visor taping
Callaway Chevron logo on front
X Hot logo on side
HEX golf ball logo on side
Odyssey logo on back

Lightweight performance mesh
100% polyester fabric
Constructed designs

Bag: 100% polyester.Machine washImported

This men's sock from FootJoy quickly lifts moisture and vapor off of your skin, allowing for a drier, more comfortable sock whatever the temperature or activity. The ProDry Sport Sock has heel-to-toe cushioning, a comfortable enclosed toe seam, a reinforced heel and extra cushioning in the sole and heel areas for added support. Natural cotton fiber offers breathability while Lycra provides excellent fit and superior stretch recovery.

Features:Structured high profile fitted construction.Curved billed construction.Contrasting embroidered eyelets for ntilation.3-D RBZ logo on crown with RocketBallz branding on sides.TaylorMade logo on back.Dark underbill to reduce glare.Moisture wicking headband helps keep sweat out of your eyes.96% cotton, 4% spandex material
productname: TaylorMade RBZ High Crown Fitted S/M

Born in 2009, Druh belts were the creation of past European Tour player Simon Hurd, who's love of vibrant and colourful designs certainly made him stand out during his time on the professional circuit. Since 2009 the popularity of Druh belts (Hurd spelt backwards) has increased beyond everyone's expectations, with some of the biggest names in golf now wearing a Druh belt with pride!The vast number of celebrities and professional golfers that choose to wear Druh Belts include Lee Westwood, Robert Karlsson, Paul McGinley, Alan Shearer, Jamie Redknapp, Sophie Gustafson, Christina Kim, Eddie Jordan and many many more, including the players from the Solheim and Seve Vivendi team events.The Players Collection belt features an oversized fashion metal buckle featuring the attractive Druh Belt logo.The full length premium leather strap is extremely durable and hard wearing. The standard width fits through most of today's fashion trousers for a fantastic look on the course.The buckle is approximately 7.8cm x 5.4cm. One size fits all. Each belt can be simply cut to size and re-inserted into the buckle to give you the perfect custom made fit and feel you just do not get with any other belt!
Variant: 30" to 40" Adjustable Black ; 30" to 40" Adjustable Blue ; 30" to 40" Adjustable Brown ; 30" to 40" Adjustable Pink ; 30" to 40" Adjustable Purple ; 30" to 40" Adjustable White ;
